Paragraph: The participation of reactive oxygen species in aminoglycoside - induced ototoxicity has been deduced from observations that aminoglycoside - iron complexes catalyze the formation of superoxide radicals in vitro and that antioxidants attenuate ototoxicity in vivo .

Note: "The participation of" and "has been deduced from observations that" are not chemical entities. "Aminoglycoside - iron complexes" can be considered as a complex of two entities, so it is not included as a separate entity in the table.
